title: Banned?
body:
I try to login and i get an unexpected error.. 

Am i banned after returning all these years later?

replies.body: It sounds like your network is failing to reach a service.  I'm assuming this is with our authentication server since you mention logging in.  In this case, run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix up whatever is causing that block from happening.  I hope that helps!

http://i.imgur.com/j4JFcUW.png
Looks as if i've been suspended. 

Strange, I just came back from a break.
